metadata.synopsis: PAD is triggered when we read either "Coronation Pass" or "Coronation Poster". Both refer to the ceremony of Gortash becoming Archduke.It's not really a coronation, since he doesn't become a king.Only triggered if you don't know already about the ceremony.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Gortash is being named Archduke? Time to pay Wyrm's Rock a visit.
